column4: I was trying to boot from the ubuntu live cd on my SAMSUNG R40plus notebook pc with a cheap intgrated ATI RADEON Graphics adapter but the X couldn't start! I tryed vga=771. Didn't help. HOW CAN I SOVLE IT? PLEASE!

Guys, I have no luck getting x to work. :-( ! I tyed both ATI and VESA drivers, but X doesn't start. It is a wide sceen Samsung R40 notebook that I use. I guess it has to do with screen resolution, or the other screen things... Does anyone have an idea what to do to set the right resolution? PLEASE
Need help setting resolution for my lattop's wide screen!
Guys, need help setting screen resolution
sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg -phigh choose "fglrx" when asked for a driver
np, you now need to restart X with: sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart
There will be no Alpha 6 release
they will go straight to Beta?
